Issue.creator: jyellick
Issue.summary: As a fabric devleoper, I need a way to deserialize individual fields without deserializing the whole structure.
Issue.description: The rationale behind custom marshaling for FAB-13500 is to allow more fine-grained dependencies in the read set of transactions depending on the chaincode (or other namespace) definition. Therefore, it's necessary to allow the deserialization of single fields from serialized structures.
